TextView.android:text: What was the outcome of the pregnancy.
What was the date of the outcome?
What was the date of the outcome? - Don't know/refused
What was the time of the outcome? (WRITE DOWN RESPONSE ON THE BLANK; FILL IN AS COMPLETE AS POSSIBLE)
Did the baby cry, move, or breathe immediately upon birth? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
What is the sex of baby/[NAME]?
Was baby/[name] born early, on time, or later than expected? (PRE-TERM IS DEFINED AS LESS THAN 37 WEEKS)
How many weeks pregnant were you when you delivered baby/[name]? (WRITE DOWN THE NUMBER IN THE BLANK)
What was the expected date of birth of the baby/[name]?
What was the date of birth of the baby/[name]?
What was the name of health facility where baby/[name] was born?
Who assisted with the delivery of baby/[name]? PROBE TO IDENTIFY THE TYPE OF SOURCE (CIRCLE ALL THAT APPLY)l
When baby/[name] was born, was baby/[name] very small, small, average, large, or very large? (CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)
Which measurement system was followed to take the weight?
From where the weight data was collected in earlier question?
Did you ever breastfeed baby/[name]?\n(CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE)

What is the relationship of baby/[name] to the household head?\n(CIRCLE ONE RESPONSE, OR WRITE RESPONSE FOR 7)\n *Only include this question if relationship with the household head is not asked as part of the household roster. For example: Still birth *
